question: What is his background?
answer: With Ragioniere Programmatore from ITC "De Amicis" Rovigo, Foundation Course in Ladies Gaelic Football Coaching from LGFA, Raffaello Franco has 1 mo of experience as a Direttore at Intesa Sanpaolo in Costa di Rovigo, Veneto, Italia, 2 yrs 4 mos of experience as a Direttore at Intesa Sanpaolo in Costa di Rovigo, Veneto, Italia, 7 yrs 10 mos of experience as a Allenatore capo at Venetian Lionesses Lgfc in Monselice (PD), 8 yrs 3 mos of experience as a President at New Ascaro Rovigo asd in Rovigo, Italia, 8 yrs 6 mos of experience as a Allenatore capo at Nazionale Italiana Ladies Gaelic Football in Italia, 15 yrs 7 mos of experience as a Giornalista sportivo at Ordine dei Giornalisti del Veneto in Veneto, Italia, 30 yrs 8 mos of experience as a Director at CASSA DI RISPARMIO DEL VENETO SPA in Rovigo, Italia, 1 yr of experience as a Organizzatore at XXIII Torneo “Mirko Petternella” 7’s in Rovigo, Veneto, Italia, 1 yr 11 mos of experience as a General Manager at Rugby Rovigo Delta Ascare Ladies in Rovigo, Italia, 1 yr 1 mo of experience as a Caporale at ESERCITO ITALIANO in and is proficient in Gestione eventi, Strategia di marketing, Social media marketing, Microsoft Office, Social media, Assistenza clienti, Management, Organizzazione eventi, Marketing communication, Pubbliche relazioni, Social networking, Banking, Marketing online, Pubblicità, Marketing, Giornalismo, Customer Service, Advertising, Sport marketing, Consulenza manageriale.
